/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. A large overpass stretches across the scene, hinting at the city's complex infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the overpass, and gives the viewer a sense of being part of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings.
